params._verifier: The payment verifier address to add

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._verifier: The payment verifier address to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._acceptAll: True to accept all payment verifiers, false to require whitelisting

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addPaymentVerifier(address).notice: ONLY OWNER: Adds a payment verifier to the whitelist.

removePaymentVerifier(address).notice: ONLY OWNER: Removes a payment verifier from the whitelist.

setAcceptAllVerifiers(bool).notice: ONLY OWNER: Sets whether all payment verifiers can be used without whitelisting.
